text: Alaha hi hai jisa ne tuhade la'i dharati nu thahirana da sathana bana'i'a ate akasa nu chata bana'i'a ate tuhada sarupa bana'i'a ate sarupa vi sohana bana'i'a. Ate usa ne tuhanu cagi'am cizam khana nu diti'am. Iha alaha hi hai, tuhada raba jihara bara hi barakata vala hai. Alaha sare sasara da palanahara hai
